Log: ------------------------- Hot Fix 1.1.1.0 --------------------- + Fixed some funny bugs in printing feature + Added autoprint checkbox in printing options ------------------------- Release 1.1.0.0 --------------------- + !!! Please check your projects customization after update !!! + New Photo Mode: all new templates for photo capture + Photo capture improved + Select capture mode after "Start" screen if photo & video capture activated + Test Photo mode: select multiply photo for test render with selected template + Test Video improved + Improved app stability & speed + Fix some freaky bugs
